Topic.Title: all i want to know is what the hell they are gonna do with the cash, i cant make a move until i know, this really blows

Message.Msg: this is so simple, it just baffles me the knuckleheads at YHOO can't figure this out...but when have they ever made good decisions... anyway... they need to start paying a quarterly dividend. there are a lot of investors that won't touch a stock if they don't pay dividends. it also gives legitimacy to themselves. instead of looking like a friggin internet company, they can put themselves in the light of being a technology company that will be around for a while. stock buybacks won't work unless they retire the stock. a special dividend is stupid because the stock price will fall by that amount. sure, you pay off the fools that have been holding since $34, but it's only $2-3 bucks. a quarterly dividend will allow them to use the cash for acquisitions and development, and not blow their whole wad on shareholders that would be happy with taking a couple bucks and then dumping the stock anyway after they get it.

Topic.Title: Yahoo Up Sharply in AH Trading

Message.Msg: New Yahoo Inc CEO Marissa Mayer laid out broad goals for the Internet giant in her first companywide address Tuesday, and received an enthusiastic reception from a workforce that has faced years of uncertainty and management turmoil. Mayer mainly sketched broad visions rather than related stories concrete details for her turnaround strategy, according to several people familiar with what was said in the tightly controlled meeting.
